text: Gárdony, "the capital of Lake Velencei", is a holiday resort on the south side of the lake. It is 45 kilometers from Budapest and 20 kilometers from Székesfehérvár. It has active recreation, entertainment facilities, different kinds of accommodation and restaurants for the whole year. == Other website == * Gárdony.hu Category:Cities in Hungary Category:Fejér County
title: Gárdony
